# Circle of Flame (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja]] 5 (fire)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Area:** All creatures within a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 98

Fire bursts in all directions from the point of origin, dealing 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +20) to nearby creatures.
